query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTW0302( MANDT, LIFNR, PERNO, INP_DT, PSPID, POSID, M_MH, A_MH, N_MH, BEFORE_R, DAY_R, OUTS, MDATE, MTIME, ERNAM, INIT_DT, OM_MH, OA_MH, ON_MH ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #LIFNR#, #PERNO#, #INP_DT#, #PSPID#, #POSID#, #M_MH#, #A_MH#, #N_MH#, #BEFORE_R#, #DAY_R#, #OUTS#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID#, #INIT_DT#, #OM_MH#, #OA_MH#, #ON_MH# )
